text: Anton-Martin Bauer (born 10 September 1963) is an Austrian equestrian. He competed at the 1996 Summer Olympics and the 2000 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Austrian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Austria Category:Equestrians at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:People from Graz-Umgebung District
title: Anton-Martin Bauer
